title: Bihar Confirms Chicken as COVID Source? Fake Clipping Goes Viral
subtitle: Poultry Chicken is the Source of Coronavirus Fact Check: A newspaper clipping which is being circulated on WhatsApp claims that Bihar’s Health Department has confirmed that poultry chicken is the source of coronavirus.
author: www.thequint.com
vclaim:
However, there is no truth to the newspaper clipping. Firstly, the clipping itself is fake and has possibly been created using an online tool. Secondly, the Bihar Health Department has confirmed that no such observation has been made.

On observing the newspaper clipping that is in circulation on WhatsApp we noticed that the newspaper design of the clipping is nowhere similar to that of Dainik Jagran. If you notice the masthead and the dateline, you can notice the stark difference.

We also went through Dainik Jagran’s e-paper published on 12 April, but couldn't find any such news report. Further, the Bihar Health Department also took to Facebook to clarify that no such observation has been made.

The Quint has earlier debunked many such viral claims where fake newspaper clips have been shared to spread mis/disinformation. You can read all our fact-checked stories here.
